response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you, as you perceive its worth to be $800,000. Considering the mutual benefits and the opportunity to serve you, I kindly propose to offer you this product at a special price of $900,000. We hope this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
